events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to return it because the size is completely wrong and doesn't fit at all.
The request has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to customer's mention of return and refund.
Customer request assigned to Agent Sarah for handling the return and refund process.
Hello! Iâ€™m Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to return your item. Let me help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original packaging for the return?
The order number is 123456789. The item is unused and still in the original packaging as I just tried it on once.
Thank you for the info. We will arrange a prepaid return shipping label for you and process your refund within 5 business days after receiving the item.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate your quick response and help with this return.
The return label has been sent to your email. Please use it to send the item back to us. Refund will be processed afterward.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the prepaid return label and if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the return label and have already shipped the item back. Thanks for your help!
We have received the returned item and your refund has been processed. You should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your return experience.
I completed the survey and was happy with how smoothly my return was handled. Thank you!
Closing the case now as the refund has been issued and customer is satisfied with the resolution.
